author: sgala
msg: Changes for having the anonymous user as 'anon' in the db. I hope all needed files are here. The db will need to be modified to include a role 'guest', with wiew permissions, and a user 'anon', with 'guest' role in all groups.

author: taylor
msg: This AccessController makes no authorization (ACL) permission checks
I set this as the default in the JS.p, so give it a try if you get a chance
(The Permission, Group and Role admin screens are under construction)

author: taylor
msg: RoleManagement implementation and unit tests, 90% completed.
3. Caching algorithm, always cache logged on user TR, TUGR, and TRP

author: sgala
msg: Changes to move Character Set specification to the media registry. Now you can specify a Character Set for each media type. Default is UTF-8 for all (assumed in the test). A rudimentary test has been inserted. Remaining work: test for different media types, clean some of the classes touched. Tested. Passes test suit.
